name: Paradise of Ladakh
details: Embark on a 4-night, 5-day adventure through the breathtaking landscapes of Ladakh. Witness the beauty of high-altitude desert valleys, ancient monasteries, and stunning lakes as you explore this Himalayan wonderland.
highlights: Acclimatization and exploration of Leh city
Drive through the magnetic Sham Valley and witness the confluence of the Indus and Zanskar rivers
Experience Nubra Valley's sand dunes and double-humped camels
Visit the iconic Pangong Lake, famous for its changing colors
Explore cultural and historical landmarks, including Leh Palace and Thiksey Monastery

itinerary.title: Arrival in Leh
activities: Arrival and transfer to the hotel
Acclimatization and leisure time
Evening visit to Shanti Stupa, Leh Palace, and local bazaar
Overnight stay at the hotel

itinerary.title: Drive to Sham Valley
activities: Visit Magnetic Hill, Gurudwara Pathar Sahib, Sangam (Zanskar-Indus Confluence), Hall of Fame Museum, and Spituk Monastery
Return to Leh for an overnight stay

itinerary.title: Leh to Nubra Valley (via Khardung-La Pass)
activities: Drive through the world's highest motorable pass, Khardung-La (18,380 ft)
Visit Nubra Valley and check-in at the camp
Enjoy a camel safari at Nubra Sand Dunes
Visit Diskit Monastery
Overnight stay in Nubra

itinerary.title: Nubra to Pangong Lake - Leh
activities: Drive to Pangong Lake on the Indo-China border
Witness the mesmerizing color-changing lake
Drive back through Chang La Pass, visiting Thiksey Monastery en route
Return to Leh for an overnight stay

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Transfer to the airport with sweet memories of Ladakh

name: The Ultimate Ladakh Adventure
details: Embark on an unforgettable journey through the mesmerizing landscapes of Ladakh with Royal Explorers. Experience the raw beauty of the Himalayas, the thrill of high-altitude mountain passes, and the serenity of pristine lakes on this carefully curated adventure.
highlights: Acclimatization in Leh, the heart of Ladakh
Drive through Khardungla Pass, the world's highest motorable road
Explore the mesmerizing Nubra Valley with its unique sand dunes and double-humped camels
Visit Turtuk, India's last village near the Pakistan border
Witness the magical beauty of Pangong Lake, famous for its ever-changing colors
Discover ancient monasteries, cultural landmarks, and historic sites
accommodation: 1 Double Sharing Room + 1 Extra Bed / 1 Family Room

itinerary.title: Arrival in Leh
activities: Arrival and transfer to the hotel
The rest of the day is at leisure to acclimatize to Leh's high altitude (11,500 ft)
Overnight at the hotel

itinerary.title: Leh Sightseeing
activities: After breakfast, proceed for local sightseeing of Sangam, Magnetic Hill, Gurdwara Pathar Sahib, Hall of Fame, and Shanti Stupa
Overnight at the hotel

itinerary.title: Leh – Nubra Valley (4-5 Hours)
activities: Morning after breakfast, drive to Nubra Valley via Khardungla Pass (18,380 ft), the highest motorable road in the world
Descend into Nubra Valley, check-in at the camp
In the evening, enjoy a camel safari (at your own cost)
Overnight stay at the hotel

itinerary.title: Nubra – Turtuk – Nubra (3 Hours One Way)
activities: After breakfast, drive to Turtuk, the last Indian village near the Pakistan border
Visit the local village and museum before returning to Nubra for an overnight stay at the camp

itinerary.title: Nubra – Pangong (4-5 Hours)
activities: After breakfast, drive to Pangong Lake via Shayok Valley
This 14,000 ft high brackish lake is situated between India and China, with 25% in India and 75% in China
Upon arrival, check in at the camp and witness the mesmerizing color-changing lake
Overnight at the resort

itinerary.title: Pangong – Leh (4-5 Hours)
activities: After breakfast, drive to Leh via Changla Pass (17,000 ft)
En route, visit Thiksey Monastery and Rancho School (3 Idiots School)
Overnight at the hotel

itinerary.title: Leh Exploration
activities: Morning visit to Leh Palace and enjoy traditional Ladakhi vegetarian cuisine at a local Ladakhi house
Evening free for shopping
Overnight at the hotel

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Transfer to the airport with sweet memories of Ladakh

name: Ladakh Ultimate Biking Adventure
details: Experience the thrill of riding through the rugged terrains of Ladakh on this 6-night, 7-day biking expedition. Conquer the world's highest motorable roads, witness breathtaking landscapes, and explore the rich culture of this Himalayan paradise.
highlights: Acclimatization & bike check in Leh (Altitude: 11,500 ft)
Ride through Khardung-La Pass (18,380 ft), the world's highest motorable road

Visit Turtuk, the last Indian village near the Pakistan border

Cultural visits to monasteries, palaces, and iconic landmarks
